LanguageData.OECivilian.degreeDatas.handyman.label: handyman
LanguageData.OECivilian.degreeDatas.handyman.descript: {PAWN_nameDef} is a natural {PAWN_pronoun}. {PAWN_nameDef} is smart and work harder than others.
LanguageData.OESoldier.degreeDatas.trained.label: trained
LanguageData.OESoldier.degreeDatas.trained.descriptio: After many trainings, {PAWN_nameDef} learned how to use any weapon.
LanguageData.OENomad.degreeDatas.nomad.label: nomad
LanguageData.OENomad.degreeDatas.nomad.description: {PAWN_pronoun}'s are used to eating less food and getting enough sleep faster than others.
LanguageData.OECultist.degreeDatas.spiritual.label: spiritual
LanguageData.OECultist.degreeDatas.spiritual.descript: {PAWN_nameDef} has an unshakable will and body capable of withstanding any test.
LanguageData.OEEidolon.degreeDatas.proudly.label: proudly
LanguageData.OEEidolon.degreeDatas.proudly.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef} as a hero bathed in glory.
LanguageData.OEUnstableCatalyst.degreeDatas.unstable_: A volatile force stirs within {PAWN_nameDef}. When pushed to the edge, {PAWN_pronoun} may erupt with a surge of brilliance—or chaos.\nThere is a 75% chance that a mental break will trigger a random Inspiration.
Driven by unstable energy, [PAWN_nameIndef] unlocks untamed potential.
LanguageData.OEUnstableLaborer.degreeDatas.unstable_l: {PAWN_nameDef} pushes {PAWN_pronoun}self to extremes, chasing fleeting sparks of productivity at great mental cost.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Work Frenzy.
Driven by inner chaos, [PAWN_nameIndef] enters a manic work frenzy.
LanguageData.OEUnstableWanderer.degreeDatas.unstable_: Restless and unpredictable, {PAWN_nameDef} finds moments of clarity in rapid, purposeless motion.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Go Frenzy.
Overwhelmed by turmoil, [PAWN_nameIndef] feels an irresistible urge to move.
LanguageData.OEUnstableMarksman.degreeDatas.unstable_: In moments of instability, {PAWN_nameDef}'s focus sharpens, turning chaos into deadly precision.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Shooting Frenzy.
Riding the edge of madness, [PAWN_nameIndef] becomes unnervingly accurate with ranged weapons.
LanguageData.OEUnstableTrader.degreeDatas.unstable_tr: {PAWN_nameDef}'s fractured mind occasionally strikes upon strokes of commercial genius.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Inspired Trade.
Through the haze of instability, [PAWN_nameIndef] glimpses a moment of brilliant negotiation.
LanguageData.OEUnstableCharmer.degreeDatas.unstable_c: {PAWN_nameDef}'s erratic energy makes {PAWN_pronoun} strangely persuasive at the strangest times.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Inspired Recruitment.
With unstable conviction, [PAWN_nameIndef] gains the charm to sway others.
LanguageData.OEUnstableWhisperer.degreeDatas.unstable: {PAWN_nameDef}'s volatile aura oddly resonates with animals, if only for a moment.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Inspired Taming.
Driven by turmoil, [PAWN_nameIndef] momentarily connects deeply with nature's creatures.
LanguageData.OEUnstableSurgeon.degreeDatas.unstable_s: In a rare balance between madness and clarity, {PAWN_nameDef} performs medical miracles.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Inspired Surgery.
Compelled by desperation, [PAWN_nameIndef] achieves surgical perfection.
LanguageData.OEUnstableCreator.degreeDatas.unstable_c: From the storm in {PAWN_pronoun} mind, bursts of artistic brilliance emerge.\nThere is a 50% chance that a mental break will trigger a Inspired Creativity.
Inspired by inner chaos, [PAWN_nameIndef] becomes creatively unstoppable.
There’s something exceptional in {PAWN_nameDef} - a golden spark of talent in every endeavor.
Once full of promise, {PAWN_nameDef} now walks a dimmer path, struggling to meet expectations.
LanguageData.OEQualityMining.degreeDatas.vein_whisper: {PAWN_nameDef} extracts riches with uncanny precision, though never in a hurry.
LanguageData.OEQualityMining.degreeDatas.tunnel_dance: {PAWN_nameDef} digs fast and fearlessly, but often leaves value behind.
LanguageData.OEQualityCooking.degreeDatas.careful_che: {PAWN_nameDef} values safety and quality in every meal, even if it takes a little longer.
LanguageData.OEQualityCooking.degreeDatas.blazing_coo: Quick in the kitchen, {PAWN_nameDef} favors speed over caution.
LanguageData.OEQualityPlants.degreeDatas.gentle_harve: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures every crop with care, but tends the fields at a measured pace.
LanguageData.OEQualityPlants.degreeDatas.swift_plante: {PAWN_nameDef} works the land with swift hands, though some harvests suffer.
LanguageData.OEQualityAnimals.degreeDatas.careful_han: {PAWN_nameDef} takes time to care for animals properly, often gathering more from each creature.
LanguageData.OEQualityAnimals.degreeDatas.efficient_h: {PAWN_nameDef} works quickly when gathering from animals, but may leave some resources behind.
LanguageData.OEFishermanVCEF.degreeDatas.deep_catcher: {PAWN_nameDef} fishes with care and focus, often reeling in more with every cast.
LanguageData.OEFishermanVCEF.degreeDatas.quick_hook.d: {PAWN_nameDef} casts fast and often, though some fish may slip the hook.
LanguageData.OEPsyBlood.degreeDatas.noble_blood.label: noble blood
LanguageData.OEPsyBlood.degreeDatas.noble_blood.descr: {PAWN_nameDef} heir to an ancient and noble family. The presence of {PAWN_pronoun} gives an innate talent for psy abilities.
LanguageData.OEPsyMonk.degreeDatas.monk.label: monk
LanguageData.OEPsyMonk.degreeDatas.monk.description: {PAWN_nameDef} finds unusual clarity in stillness, drawing power from every moment of reflection.
LanguageData.OEPsyWarrior.degreeDatas.psywarrior.desc: Battle comes naturally to {PAWN_nameDef}, whose strikes carry both physical strength and psychic force.
LanguageData.OEPsyMarksman.degreeDatas.psymarksman.de: {PAWN_nameDef}'s aim is guided by both steady hands and a sharpened psychic sense.
LanguageData.OEIdeoSpread.degreeDatas.ardent_preacher: {PAWN_nameDef} spreads beliefs with burning zeal—but sometimes burns too hot, even for {PAWN_pronoun}self.
LanguageData.OEIdeoSpread.degreeDatas.quiet_soul.desc: Calm and steady, {PAWN_nameDef} rarely stirs conflict—but struggles to inspire deep conviction in others.
LanguageData.OEIdeoPower.degreeDatas.lawbringer.label: lawbringer
LanguageData.OEIdeoPower.degreeDatas.lawbringer.descr: With a gaze like a loaded rifle, {PAWN_nameDef} brings order to chaos—but the burden of justice weighs heavy.
LanguageData.OEIdeoPower.degreeDatas.softspoken_deput: {PAWN_nameDef} keeps the peace with a light touch, avoiding conflict—but lacks the grit to lay down the law.
LanguageData.OEIdeoHacking.degreeDatas.netrunner.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} flows through firewalls and protocols like water—faster than most can blink.
LanguageData.OEIdeoHacking.degreeDatas.cyber_tinker.d: Curious and clever, {PAWN_nameDef} can pull systems apart and put them back better than before—most of the time.
{PAWN_nameDef} knows just enough to poke at systems—but lacks the chops to crack the real code.
LanguageData.OEIdeoHacking.degreeDatas.terminal_hazar: When {PAWN_nameDef} touches a console, it’s only a matter of time before something breaks—badly.
LanguageData.OEMechLove.degreeDatas.mech_fan.label: mech fan
LanguageData.OEMechLove.degreeDatas.mech_fan.descript: {PAWN_nameDef} is a big fan of mechanoids. As a {PAWN_pronoun} can control a larger number of mechanoids.
LanguageData.OEMechInstinct.degreeDatas.mechtech_inst: {PAWN_nameDef} works with mechanoids as if born to it, quickly building, tuning, and restoring every mech.
LanguageData.OERitualist.degreeDatas.ritual_master.de: Rituals energize {PAWN_nameDef}, who executes them with precision and passion.
LanguageData.OERitualist.degreeDatas.ceremonial_adept: {PAWN_nameDef} performs rituals efficiently and without hesitation.
LanguageData.OERitualist.degreeDatas.unsteady_speaker: Rituals don’t come naturally to {PAWN_nameDef}, who often falters in rhythm.
LanguageData.OERitualist.degreeDatas.reluctant_vessel: {PAWN_nameDef} resents the sacred rites and performs them poorly.
LanguageData.OEFisherman.degreeDatas.deep_catcher.des: {PAWN_nameDef} fishes with care and focus, often reeling in more with every cast.
LanguageData.OEFisherman.degreeDatas.quick_hook.label: quick hook
LanguageData.OEFisherman.degreeDatas.quick_hook.descr: {PAWN_nameDef} casts fast and often, though some fish may slip the hook.
LanguageData.OEPilotingGood.degreeDatas.ace_pilot.des: Born to fly, {PAWN_nameDef} turns even the most stubborn ship into a dancing starbird.
LanguageData.OEPilotingBad.degreeDatas.clumsy_flier.d: Every time {PAWN_nameDef} touches the controls, someone checks the escape pods-just in case.
